Don't know what to do at this point.  I'm sure this will get closed as
"worksforme" or whatever but I figured there is a slim chance that someone has
seen this behavior before.

seems to be fixed in 3.0.

Looked at the stack trace and it seems that opening the editor failed. So I
suspect that there is another problem around. The VM dump looks ok, I can't
really see where the process hangs.

as you said: worksforme. thanks for reporting.
